title: Why no Elise buffs =(
body: Why not Riot? =( Her win rate is so low

replies.body: Elise is a little bit of a problem champion. If her damage is high, like it was around her release and for awhile afterwards, she becomes a power pick because she is somewhat of a generalist, much like Vi, Jarvan, and Lee Sin; However if she has lower damage, she's a walking stun bot more or less. Her kit is somewhat feast or famine in my opinion. To this end, I've created a rework proposal, keeping many of the same abilities that Elise already has and tweaking a few things, check it out if you're intrested! [Black Widow or Beefy Tarantula?](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/2qKG9p3Q-black-widow-or-beey-tarantula?comment=0000)

I think the problem with Elise's damage being too high has always came from the fact that a lot of her damage is innate in her kit and requires no commitment (via AP). If they would nerf her bases and give good boosts to her ratios I feel like she'd be a lot healthier. Then again people don't seem to complain about full tank Mundo doing damage so I don't know.

Because her kit is kinda stupid and they're worried if they buff her she'll become the competitive god jungler she was for so long back when she was released.

I think she's up for a rework.

Yeah, she was made during the period when characters could change between 2 kits willy-nilly, and have since learned that is a tough thing to balance. With the way she's currently setup, it's going to be pretty tough to put her in a better spot while keeping both of her forms valuable.

She's in a bit of a weird spot. Right now she has both a stun and a targetted leap, a tankier + quicker form and a stronger + smaller hitbox form that she can change on an instant, so she's some kind of an assassin pseudo-tank with adequate cc, mobility, and the ability to whittle away tanky targets with her % damage. She's halfway between a jungle generalist and Irelia (better nerf). 

I think one way Riot could add not only more power-budget to her kit, but also more uniqueness and a bonus layer of difficulty (separating the inexperienced from the masters), would be to give her transformation a short (1 second?) channel. Doing so would ease the burden Riot currently has of trying to make her ability to switch at will with no costs not be a universal/on a dime change and gaining the benefits from it accordingly. Gnar's inability to directly control his transformations is what made room for more power in his kit and I think Elise could take a note from that too. The channel shouldn't be so long that it's debilitating, but enough to make it so that she should commit to a single form for a gank/duel unless she's able to buy herself the second of safety needed to switch.

An alternative way of transforming that keeps the same general idea I was going for: A Twitch-stealth like mechanic where she can move just fine for the duration and take damage, but she can't cast abilities until the 1 second transformation is complete.

Because I imagine there are plenty of veteran Elise players that hate the idea I just pitched, Riot could always do the standard "make this targetted ability a skillshot so we can add range/damage/counterplay to her kit" since admittedly a large portion of what damage she does deal is targetted. Or they could try to make her less of a generalist, making her human form more of the damage based assassin and the spider form more of the mobility/farming side, adjusting her numbers accordingly. Even then though, the ability to switch between those 2 suddenly seems like it's problematic.

Honestly, my main complaint about Elise's kit is the fact that they gave her %current and %missing health. This means she can build a magic pen item and then build straight tank and still have a bunch of damage from every occasion, which combined with her innate lifesteal and grapple mechanic, means she's really hard to kill.

Elise is a major contributor for my hatred of %hp damage.

Because Riot hates Elise. Look at her patch history. Straight nerfs. Luden's is pretty nice to up her burst IMO, I'm having fun with it at least. Did you know her spider Q was originally a slow? Or that her Rappel was supposed to stun people that walked under it while she was mid-air? She needs more innate tank or CC honestly. That way she can BUILD more damage. There needs to be a bonus for having all of your spiderlings alive (bonus resists, fear on next SQ, etc. I'd really like to see a fear worked in there since spiders are like the number one phobia it makes sense. But as an elise main, I know better than to expect a buff, ever. Elise isn't popular so she isn't important and she never will be. Even when she was good no one played her.
